article_title: From GOP, only tricks when it comes to Affordable Care Act
article_text:
With another ACA enrollment period beginning Nov. 1, it’s clear health care reform is here to stay

Voters want lawmakers to implement and improve the ACA so that we can enjoy the full economic and human benefits it can provide

Poll after poll has shown that voters want Congress to stop wasting time and taxpayer money voting over and over again to repeal the ACA and to work to implement and improve it

article_metadata.news-keywords: Kevin, Rogers, NC, North Carolina, action, ACA, Obamacare, affordable, care, act, Obama, expand, Medicaid, health, costs
